summary: Confirmed that the 'Join the group' Telegram button has been successfully implemented in the main application header. The button is positioned in the top right corner with proper styling, icon, and link to the provided Telegram group URL. It appears consistently across all screens (Search, Enrichment, Action, Settings) as it's implemented in the main wrapper component.
current_status: The Telegram group integration is complete and functional. The button provides persistent access to the community group from any screen in the application. Previous implementations include dynamic column suggestions for enrichment and comprehensive search functionality with CSV parsing and link processing capabilities.
